name: twister
flavor_text: The user whips up a vicious tornado to tear at the opposing Pok√©mon. This may also make them flinch.
effect_text_extend:
Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to make each target flinch.

If the target is under the effect of bounce, fly, or sky drop, this move will hit with double power.
effect_text_simple: Has a $effect_chance% chance to make the target flinch.
